DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine how the human body processes and eliminates the drug (BMS-690514.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Metabolism of Radiolabeled BMS-690514 in Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects Body mass index (BMS) of 18 30 kg/mÂ², inclusive Radiation exposure from diagnostic Xrays (except dental Xrays) in the last year or from clinical trials in the last 5 years
